scripts.prepare: npm install dev-env-installer@0.0.10 -g && npm install rimraf -g && npm install mocha
scripts.installParser: cd ../ && rimraf parser && mkdir parser && cd ./parser && git clone -b develop https://www.github.com/raml-org/raml-js-parser-2 --depth 1 && cd ../TravisTests && npm run doInstallParser
scripts.doInstallParser: cd ../parser/raml-js-parser-2 && dev-env-installer install --workspace ../ --descriptor ./workspace.json -directlinks && npm run buildall  && cd ../../TravisTests
